name: GrillingTimeAndHeatSettings
0:
”Alexa, launch grilling guide.”
”How do I grill chicken breast?”
”How do I barbecue a New York Strip?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grilling guide
des: Give grilling guide a type of meat, fish, or vegetable, and Alexa will return the proper grilling temperature (high, medium or low), method (direct or indirect heat), and the length of time to grill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
